subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Devils  have reacquired forward Jason Arnott, trading right wing Matt Halischuk and a second-round draft pick in the 2011 draft to the Nashville Predators for the 35-year-old Arnott.
snippet: The Devils  have reacquired forward Jason Arnott, trading right wing Matt Halischuk and a second-round draft pick in the 2011 draft to the Nashville Predators for the 35-year-old Arnott.
